item.title: Activities
item.description: The Association will organize various cultural and networking activities. You can track them here and checko out the News section for upcoming ones. Activities April 22nd, 2019 - European Research Night Euraxess Website

item.title: Join
item.description: Get in touch with us to become a member. You can fill out the Google form here.

item.title: Life in Japan
item.description: Here you will find practical information for an Italian living in Japan. item.title: Links
item.description: This is a collection of useful links for Italian researchers in Japan, ranging from sources of practical information to institutions providing research funding. Back to Home Useful links Institutional Contacts Embassies Italian Embassy in Japan, Tokyo Italian Consulate in Osaka Japanese Embassy in Italy, Rome Japanese Consulate in Milan Travel Viaggare sicuri Research EURAXESS Japan Research Funds Japan Society for the Promotion of Science (JSPS) Fellowships JSPS Postdoctoral Fellowships JSPS Guidelines on Application and Deadlines JSPS Postdoc Fellowships for researchers coming from specific countries JSPS Postdoctoral Fellowship from Germany JSPS Postdoctoral Fellowship from the UK Other Fellowships RIKEN Special Postdoctoral Researcher EU Marie Sklodowska-Curie Actions for Japan Grants KAKENHI Grants Studentships EU-Japan Vulcanus Fellowships Research and Cultural Activities in Japan European Innovation Days by EURAXESS Nerd Nite Tokyo Nerd Nite Okinawa Le Wagon Tokyo Hello Tomorrow Japan Other European Research Associations in Japan Sciencescope ACE Japon German JSPS Alumni Association

item.title: News
item.description: Here you can find news relevant to Italian researchers in Japan. From information on upcoming activities by the Association and other entities. News section April 22nd, 2019 - European Research Night The European Research Night was hosted at Pivotal Labs and organized by the Association of Italian Researchers in Japan with the support of Euraxess. The program of the event can be found on Euraxess Website.

item.title: Stories
item.description: This section will hightlight the stories of Italian researchers in Japan: their struggles, successes, and experiences. Would you like to tel your story? Get in touch with us. Personal Stories

Life as a researcher in Japan This text is by Claudio Feliciani Click here for the Italian version. Life in Japan Beyond the aspects related to the working environment and the research world one should be reminded that as a researcher in Japan you will have to live in a very particular country, with traditions and customs often very different from Italy (and generally from Europe and western countries). This section aims at providing some suggestions and practical information regarding the daily life in Japan to people who intend to live and work in Japan.

Life as a researcher in Japan Questo testo è stato scritto da Claudio Feliciani Clicka here for the English version. La vita in Giappone Oltre agli aspetti legati al mondo della ricerca e del lavoro occorre tenere conto che in quanto ricercatore in Giappone ci si troverà a vivere in un paese molto particolare, con usanze e tradizioni spesso molto diverse dall’Italia (o generalmente dall’Europa o paesi occidentali). Questa sezione vuole dare qualche consiglio e fornire qualche informazione pratica riguardo alla vita quotidiana in Giappone a persone che intendono o hanno in previsione di vivere e lavorare in Giappone.
